mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM MAGAZINE WHERE MAGAZINE_STATUS = 'Y'

SELECT MAGAZINE_NO,MAGAZINE_TITLE,TO_CHAR(MAGAZINE_CREATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS "MAGAZINE_CREATE", MAGAZINE_COUNT,MAGAZINE_PATH FROM MAGAZINE JOIN MAGAZINE_ATTACHMENT USING (MAGAZINE_NO) WHERE MAGAZINE_STATUS = 'Y' AND MAGAZINE_IMG_LEVEL = 1 ORDER BY MAGAZINE_CREATE DESC
mapper.update: UPDATE MAGAZINE SET MAGAZINE_COUNT = MAGAZINE_COUNT + 1 WHERE MAGAZINE_NO = #{magazineNo} AND MAGAZINE_STATUS = 'Y'
mapper.select: SELECT MAGAZINE_NO , MAGAZINE_TITLE , TO_CHAR(MAGAZINE_CREATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS "MAGAZINE_CREATE" , MAGAZINE_COUNT , MAGAZINE_STATUS FROM MAGAZINE WHERE MAGAZINE_NO = #{magazineNo} AND MAGAZINE_STATUS = 'Y'
SELECT MAGAZINE_ATTACHMENT_NO , MAGAZINE_CONTENT , MAGAZINE_PATH , MAGAZINE_IMG_LEVEL , MAGAZINE_IMG_STATUS FROM MAGAZINE_ATTACHMENT WHERE MAGAZINE_NO = #{magazineNo} AND MAGAZINE_IMG_STATUS = 'Y'
